TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed FormatterServices extends System.Object
public ref class FormatterServices abstract sealed

summary.span: 提供靜態方法，協助序列化 (Serialization) 的實作。

span.span: Provides static methods to aid with the implementation of a for serialization.
This class cannot be inherited.

MemberSignature.Value: public static void CheckTypeSecurity (Type t, System.Runtime.Serialization.Formatters.TypeFilterLevel securityLevel);
.method public static hidebysig void CheckTypeSecurity(class System.Type t, valuetype System.Runtime.Serialization.Formatters.TypeFilterLevel securityLevel) cil managed
Public Shared Sub CheckTypeSecurity (t As Type, securityLevel As TypeFilterLevel)
public: static void CheckTypeSecurity(Type ^ t, System::Runtime::Serialization::Formatters::TypeFilterLevel securityLevel);

param.name: t
param.span: 要檢查還原序列化能力的 。

span.span: The to check for the ability to deserialize.
The property value.

summary.span: 判斷 屬性設為 時是否可還原序列化指定的 。

span.span: Determines whether the specified can be deserialized with the property set to .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此方法來判斷是否指定的型別可以還原序列化時屬性設定為`Low`。Use this method to determine whether a specified type can be deserialized when the property is set to `Low`. .NET framework 遠端處理提供兩種自動還原序列化，層級和。.NET Framework remoting provides two levels of automatic deserialization, and . 可以協助保護攻擊，還原序列化還原序列化的最基本的遠端處理功能與相關聯的型別。 helps protect against deserialization attacks by deserializing only the types associated with the most basic remoting functionality. 還原序列化層級支援所有型別的自動還原序列化 (遠端處理在所有情況下都支援這些型別)。The deserialization level supports automatic deserialization of all types that remoting supports in all situations. 如需有關.net Framework 遠端處理類型，和支援，請參閱[ [ \]](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/313a0e88-5b2b-4a17-8391-0ddf9f7a787b)。For more information about the.NET Framework remoting types that and support, see [[\]](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/313a0e88-5b2b-4a17-8391-0ddf9f7a787b). ## Examples 這個範例示範如何使用類別來序列化或還原序列化的物件的基底類別未實作但衍生的類別。This example shows how to use the class to serialize or deserialize an object where the base class does not implement but the derived class does. [!code-cpp[FormatterServices#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/FormatterServices/cpp/FormatterServices.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[FormatterServices#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/FormatterServices/CS/FormatterServices.cs#1)]

exception.span: 參數為進階型別，而且在 屬性設為 時無法還原序列化。

span.span: The parameter is an advanced type and cannot be deserialized when the property is set to .

MemberSignature.Value: public static object[] GetObjectData (object obj, System.Reflection.MemberInfo[] members);
.method public static hidebysig object[] GetObjectData(object obj, class System.Reflection.MemberInfo[] members) cil managed
Public Shared Function GetObjectData (obj As Object, members As MemberInfo()) As Object()
public: static cli::array <System::Object ^> ^ GetObjectData(System::Object ^ obj, cli::array <System::Reflection::MemberInfo ^> ^ members);

param.name: obj
param.span: 寫入至格式子 (Formatter) 的物件。

span.span: The object to write to the formatter.
The members to extract from the object.

summary.span: 從指定物件擷取資料，並將它傳回為物件陣列。

span.span: Extracts the data from the specified object and returns it as an array of objects.

returns.span: 的陣列，包含儲存於 以及與 相關聯的資料。

span.span: An array of that contains data stored in and associated with .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 針對每個提供成員`members`陣列方法還會擷取與相關聯的值`obj`物件，並將其傳回。For each supplied member of the `members` array the method extracts the value associated with the `obj` object, and returns it. 傳回陣列的長度是相同的長度`members`陣列。The length of the returned array is the same as the length of the `members` array. ## Examples 下列範例建立的 Book 類別執行個體，並設定執行個體上的欄位值。The following example creates an instance of a Book class and sets field values on the instance. 程式碼接著會取得型別資訊使用方法。The code then gets the type information using the method. 程式碼會將執行個體資料複製到物件陣列使用方法。The code copies the instance data into an object array using the method. 使用建立的類別未初始化的新執行個體方法。A new uninitialized instance of the class is created using the method. 最後，第一個執行個體中的資料會複製到第二個執行個體使用方法。Finally, the data from the first instance is copied into the second instance using the method. [!code-csharp[FormatterServices_PopulateObjects#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/FormatterServices_PopulateObjects/cs/Populate.cs#1)] [!code-vb[FormatterServices_PopulateObjects#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/FormatterServices_PopulateObjects/vb/Populate.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public static object GetSafeUninitializedObject (Type type);
.method public static hidebysig object GetSafeUninitializedObject(class System.Type type) cil managed
public: static System::Object ^ GetSafeUninitializedObject(Type ^ type);

span.span: The type of object to create.

summary.span: 建立指定物件型別的新執行個體。

span.span: Creates a new instance of the specified object type.

returns.span: 指定型別的零位調整物件。

span.span: A zeroed object of the specified type.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 物件的新執行個體初始化為零，並且沒有建構函式會執行，因為物件可能不表示會被視為有效該物件的狀態。Because the new instance of the object is initialized to zero and no constructors are run, the object might not represent a state that is regarded as valid by that object. 應該只用於進行還原序列化作業時使用者想要立即填入所有的欄位。 should only be used for deserialization when the user intends to immediately populate all fields. 建立空的不可變的類型執行個體不有任何用途，因為它不會建立未初始化的字串。It does not create an uninitialized string, since creating an empty instance of an immutable type serves no purpose. 將所有類別層級[連結要求](~/docs/framework/misc/link-demands.md)至[要求](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/e5283e28-2366-4519-b27d-ef5c1ddc1f48)可確保所有直接和間接呼叫端具有要求指定的權限。 converts all class level [Link Demands](~/docs/framework/misc/link-demands.md) to [Demands](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/e5283e28-2366-4519-b27d-ef5c1ddc1f48) to ensure that all direct and indirect callers have the permissions that the demand specifies. 使用從部分信任的來源還原序列化時，增加的安全性層級。Use to increase the level of security when deserializing from a partially trusted source. 為了提高效能，在完全信任情況下，使用。For better performance in full trust scenarios, use .

exception.span: 參數為 。

span.span: The parameter is .

exception.span: 參數不是有效的 Common Language Runtime 型別。

span.span: The parameter is not a valid common language runtime type.

exception.span: 呼叫端沒有必要的權限。

span.span: The caller does not have the required permission.
For providing serialization services.
Associated enumerations: , .

summary.span: 傳回特定類別的所有可序列化成員。

span.span: Returns all the serializable members for a particular class.

MemberSignature.Value: public static System.Reflection.MemberInfo[] GetSerializableMembers (Type type);
.method public static hidebysig class System.Reflection.MemberInfo[] GetSerializableMembers(class System.Type type) cil managed
public: static cli::array <System::Reflection::MemberInfo ^> ^ GetSerializableMembers(Type ^ type);

span.span: The type being serialized.

summary.span: 為指定 的類別取得所有可序列化成員。

span.span: Gets all the serializable members for a class of the specified .

returns.span: 非暫時性、非靜態成員之 型別的陣列。

span.span: An array of type of the non-transient, non-static members.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 一般而言，可序列化類別的成員會的非暫時性、 非靜態成員，例如欄位和屬性。Generally, the serializable members of a class are the non-transient, non-static members such as fields and properties. 若要包含在內，內容必須有 getter 和 setter。To be included, properties must have both a getter and a setter. 類別可實作介面或具有序列化 surrogate 不需要序列化這些成員，或可序列化的其他成員。A class that implements the interface or has a serialization surrogate does not have to serialize all these members, or can serialize additional members. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何實作方法。The following code example demonstrates implementing the method. 這個程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-cpp[FormatterServices#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/FormatterServices/cpp/FormatterServices.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[FormatterServices#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/FormatterServices/CS/FormatterServices.cs#2)]

exception.span: 參數為 。

MemberSignature.Value: public static System.Reflection.MemberInfo[] GetSerializableMembers (Type type, System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext context);
.method public static hidebysig class System.Reflection.MemberInfo[] GetSerializableMembers(class System.Type type, valuetype System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext context) cil managed
public: static cli::array <System::Reflection::MemberInfo ^> ^ GetSerializableMembers(Type ^ type, System::Runtime::Serialization::StreamingContext context);

param.name: type
param.span: 將序列化或複製的型別。

span.span: The type being serialized or cloned.

param.name: context
param.span: 其中發生序列化的內容。

span.span: The context where the serialization occurs.

summary.span: 為指定 的類別，並在所提供的 中，取得所有可序列化成員。

span.span: Gets all the serializable members for a class of the specified and in the provided .

returns.span: 非暫時性、非靜態成員之 型別的陣列。

span.span: An array of type of the non-transient, non-static members.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 一般而言，可序列化類別的成員會的非暫時性、 非靜態成員，例如欄位和屬性。Generally, the serializable members of a class are the non-transient, non-static members such as fields and properties. 若要包含在內，內容必須有 getter 和 setter。To be included, properties must have both a getter and a setter. 類別可實作或已序列化 surrogate 不需要序列化這些成員，或可序列化的其他成員。A class that implements or has a serialization surrogate does not have to serialize all these members, or can serialize additional members. 目前，您不需要執行任何不同的動作，除非`context`具有值設定。Currently, you do not need to do anything different unless `context` has the value set.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 物件的新執行個體初始化為零，並且沒有建構函式會執行，因為物件可能不表示會被視為有效該物件的狀態。Because the new instance of the object is initialized to zero and no constructors are run, the object might not represent a state that is regarded as valid by that object. 目前的方法應該只用於還原序列化時使用者想要立即填入所有的欄位。The current method should only be used for deserialization when the user intends to immediately populate all fields. 建立空的不可變的類型執行個體不有任何用途，因為它不會建立未初始化的字串。It does not create an uninitialized string, since creating an empty instance of an immutable type serves no purpose. > [!NOTE] > 您無法使用方法來建立衍生自類型的執行個體類別。You cannot use the method to create instances of types that derive from the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果中的項目`data`是`null`，不會寫入任何項目至該欄位。If an element in `data` is `null`, does not write anything to that field. ## Examples 下列範例建立的 Book 類別執行個體，並設定執行個體上的欄位值。The following example creates an instance of a Book class and sets field values on the instance. 程式碼接著會取得型別資訊使用方法。The code then gets the type information using the method. 程式碼會將執行個體資料複製到物件陣列使用方法。The code copies the instance data into an object array using the method. 使用建立的類別未初始化的新執行個體方法。A new uninitialized instance of the class is created using the method. 最後，第一個執行個體中的資料會複製到第二個執行個體使用方法。Finally, the data from the first instance is copied into the second instance using the method.
